titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to clarify the authority of the Administrator of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration with respect to post-storm assessments, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Thune with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 115-347.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 637.
